TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Maribasi, title = Maribasi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maribasi} }

S.FORM: Maribasi Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hualien ko Maribasi a niyaro', 104 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 365 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 335 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 30 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 65%, Amis 4%, Tayal 10%, Seediq 3%, Bunun 1%, roma 8%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

Maribasi Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hoalien ko Maribasi a niyaro', 104 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 365 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 335 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 30 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 65%, Amis 4%, Tayal 10%, Seediq 3%, Bonon 1%, roma 8%. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
